OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

lwt

  • 2.4.2
  • 2.4.3
  • version 2.4.4
  • 2.4.5
Maintainer jeremie@dimino.org
Dependencies ocamlfind & camlp4
Optional dependencies base-threads | base-unix | conf-libev | ssl | react < 1.0.0 | lablgtk | text
Last update May 15, 2014
Source https://github.com/ocsigen/lwt/archive/2.4.4.tar.gz
7f3e8d63055763004bb49ff4e7db44ea

A cooperative threads library for OCaml

This library is part of the Ocsigen project. See:

http://ocsigen.org/lwt
